OOC: No Airly, I have to come clean this time.

Fellow RPG People, I sent t=
he mail acting as Cardhead. I was doing it to test and see if I can make a =
Cardhead mail go through. I also sent all of the other mails that you thoug=
ht were from hackers. You just can't tell because I changed it all to show =
that Cardhead sent it. I'm very talented in that area. All I ask is your fo=
rgiveness, I'm sorry and I'll never do it again. I just went too far this t=
ime and I hope you have it in your hearts to forgive me wretched twisted so=
ul. I AM GUILTY! PS: Don't kick me out...

  ----- Original Message -----

  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Saturday, August 17, =
2002 11:33 PM

s....
